cta.description: Xiaomi SU7, the latest addition to our electric vehicle lineup, brings a whole new level of innovation and performance to the table.

slides.title: Refined Exterior
slides.description: The Xiaomi SU7 features sleek contours, a unique ducktail spoiler, and a low-drag coefficient of 0.195, delivering both striking design and peak efficiency.

slides.title: Comfortable and Smart Interior
slides.description: A symmetrical cabin with ergonomic elements, a tri-spoke D-shaped steering wheel, and advanced HUD ensures comfort and focused driving.

slides.title: Unmatched Performance
slides.description: With rapid 0-200 km/h acceleration in 10.67 seconds and fast-charging capabilities offering up to 510 km in 15 minutes, the Xiaomi SU7 redefines EV standards.

slides.title: Xiaomi Pilot Pro: Cutting-Edge Autonomous Driving
slides.description: Powered by 11 cameras and NVIDIA DRIVE Orin, Xiaomi Pilot Pro ensures seamless and advanced autonomous driving experiences.

slides.title: Smart Cabin Technology: Human × Car × Home
slides.description: The 16.1-inch screen, 5-screen linkage, and support for Xiaomi smart home devices create a connected, intuitive driving ecosystem.

slides.title: Safety First
slides.description: A steel-aluminum alloy cage and 360° active safety systems provide robust protection for unmatched peace of mind.

feaures_section.title: Exploring Spesifications, Performance Product
feaures_section.description: Xiaomi SU7, the latest addition to our electric vehicle lineup, brings a whole new level of innovation and performance to the table.

items.label: Parking aids
items.value: Front and rear sensors, 360 camera, reversing camera, Automatic Parking Assistance System

items.label: Airbags
items.value: Front, side, rear, head airbag system

footer.location_uae_address: Auto China, Umm Suqeim St - Al Quoz, Dubai
footer.about_description: Auto China, with over 20 years of automotive expertise, is the fastest-growing car company in China, with a strong presence in Europe, the Middle East, and beyond. We lead the industry with sleek designs and innovative technology, creating cars that offer both luxury and smart features. Our commitment to excellence drives us to set new standards in performance and style, shaping the future of mobility. Experience the next level of automotive innovation with Auto China.
